messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Overcorrection/instruction
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/7/2003 10:54:31 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Cameron went to Riverfest --a bunch of bands at four different stages all over the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/7/2003 10:54:31 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:
> My 13 y.o. told me I had "the parenting thing figured out really good" the
> other day.
> He's SO sweet.

Cameron went to "Riverfest"--a bunch of bands at four different stages all
over the River-area of town. On the way to drop him off I said, "If you
drink, please be careful. There'll be others there drinking and getting
obnoxious and maybe driving---just be aware and careful!"

He smiled really big and said, "Everyone else's moms are telling them NOT to
drink! You're pretty cool."

He didn't drink. He had a very good time. I picked him up at 9:30.

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Overcorrection/instruction
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/7/03 7:15:18 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/7/03 7:15:18 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I wish more people looked into unschooling when they have babies instead
of fourteen year olds that they don't know what to do with, and
relationships they don't know how to repair. >>

YES!! If I had continued on the path I was on, the relationship with my
children would be VASTLY different today.
I am eternally grateful for all the uncomfortable questions and ruffling of
feathers that has led us to this lifestyle.
My 13 y.o. told me I had "the parenting thing figured out really good" the
other day.
He's SO sweet.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
